name: Forgotten Wizard
description:
An evil wizard. A collapsing cave. One minute. Who will come out on top?

A submission for Trijam #155 (Gameplay under 1 minute!) made within one weekend with an axolotl friend of mine.

Credits:

Sound Design/Music  + Art - Axolotl
